name: SetPlayerWantedLevel
description: Set a player's wanted level (6 brown stars under HUD).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the wanted level of.

params_body.name: level
params_body.description: The wanted level to set for the player (0-6).

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player specified does not exist.
related_fn:
GetPlayerWantedLevel: Check a player's wanted level.
